title: Yosemite National Park: Bear Video
body: Bear Video                         Bears and Food Storage Yosemite's bears are adept at finding your food! This short, subtitled (no audio) video provides an overview of how you can protect bears while visiting Yosemite. (4 minutes, no audio)  Duration:4 minutes, 16 seconds           Â     Learn more about how to store your food when visiting Yosemite. Learn more about bear biology, behavior. and management.
